theatre Arts production  destigmatizes mental health at Moorpark College

IsraelHamas war sparks community demonstrations from Moorpark College student groups

ASMC hosts Moorpark Colleges first Navratri celebration

How SZA made her mark with the coveted 

Harry Styles concludes residency tour with  soldout shows at the Kia Forum

Dont apologize PERIOD Do your best PERIOD Dont ask if they want to see anything different  they will tell you if they do PERIOD And finally dont race to your car and speed away after the audition PERIOD Sometimes they think of another part you might be right for and send someone after you PERIOD

This is just a preview of the advice casting director Eileen Kennedy will offer in Auditioning Techniques one of two latestart Theater Arts classes taught by entertainment industry professionals at Moorpark College this semester PERIOD

Auditioning Techniques provides training in auditions for theatre film and television as well as instruction in preparing a resume and finding an agent PERIOD Voiceover artist and vocal coach Peggy ONeal will teach Voice and Diction which introduces the theory and practice of voice control pronunciation and breathing control techniques PERIOD

Voice and Diction CRN  is offered on Mondays from  p.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD starting Jan PERIOD  PERIOD Auditioning Techniques CRN  meets Mondays from  p.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD beginning Feb PERIOD  PERIOD Visit www.students.vcccd.net to register PERIOD

I want to introduce them students to the professional world of auditions and give them some tips on how to be a success in that world said Kennedy PERIOD If they walk away better informed then Ive done them a service. kennedy works at La Padura and Hart Casting in Los Angeles where she is currently casting Lipstick Jungle a pilot for NBC that will be shot this spring PERIOD She recently cast High School Musical  and What About Brian. she also worked on the casting for the independent feature The Painting in Insadong with Laura Adler her partner in KennedyAdler Casting PERIOD

Kennedy said that both established professionals and young students will benefit from her experience PERIOD

All I do every day is audition people said Kennedy PERIOD Its what Ive been doing for  years PERIOD Even if people decide acting is not for them it the class can give them confidence in public speaking and thinking on their feet and the interview process. kennedy earned her B.A PERIOD in English at the University of Scranton and her Master of Fine Arts at Catholic University in Washington D.C PERIOD Her career began as a casting assistant on One Life to Live in New York PERIOD Originally hired as a fiveweek temp she ended up staying for three years PERIOD Kennedy has taught at Adelphi University in New York and Rosemont College in Pennsylvania as well as Moorpark College PERIOD

ONeal has performed on television series such as The Gilmore Girls Charmed and C.S.I PERIOD New York and has provided the vocal characterizations for the animated projects Ghost in the Shell Digimon and Power Rangers. she provided the lead female voiceover in the new video game Ghost Rider to be released later this year PERIOD

ONeal has worked as a voice artist in Automated Dialogue Replacement ADR and has taught voice both privately and at Los Angeles workshops PERIOD

Everyone has something unique that they can bring to the industry said ONeal
